plum.parametric module¶

plum.parametric.parametric(Class)[source]¶

A decorator for parametric classes.

plum.parametric.type_parameter[source]¶

Get the type parameter of an instance of a parametric type.

Parameters:x (object) – Instance of a parametric type.
Returns:Type parameter.
Return type:object
plum.parametric.kind(SuperClass=<class 'object'>)[source]¶

Create a parametric wrapper type for dispatch purposes.

Parameters:SuperClass (type) – Super class.
Returns:New parametric type wrapper.
Return type:object
class plum.parametric.Kind(*xs)¶

Bases: plum.parametric.Kind

A default kind provided for convenience.

parametric¶

Boolean that indicates whether this is or contains a parametric type.
